title: The Details of the Cam Newton Deal, and Why This Makes So Much Sense | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin is joined by Ringer staff writer Tyler Tynes to break down Cam Newton’s signing with the New England Patriots. They talk about why this deal works for everybody involved, what this season could mean for the rest of Cam’s career, and the biggest misconceptions about the star quarterback (0:05). Later, Ringer staff writer Danny Kelly joins the show to talk about Cam’s fantasy outlook and how he changes the Patriots offense (22:10).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Tyler Tynes and Danny Kelly
